### Conference calls
#### Plenary calls
We hold conference calls every eight weeks or so for the entire team.

Please [contact us](mailto:bravaconsortium@gmail.com) to be added to the mailing list.

#### Analysis and Methods team calls
We hold joint conference calls every four weeks for the analysis and methods teams.

Please [contact us](mailto:bravaconsortium@gmail.com) to be added to the analysis and/or methods mailing list(s).
